title: Six views of New England
intro: Welcome to the Six Views of New England Project! This project is being conducted by Nicole Chartier and Ben Jones from the University of Washington Linguistics Department. The goal of this study is to understand how people perceive the English spoken in New England.

questions.question: What is your gender?
options: The option I would choose is not listed

questions.question: What is the highest level of school you have completed?
